name: PewPew & Pepper
description:
Small Danmaku in the Universe of Pepper and Carrot:

https://www.peppercarrot.com/

The Game Source (the branch is important):

https://github.com/cosmo-ray/little-space/tree/little-mage

Engine:

https://github.com/cosmo-ray/yirl

No idea what else to describe that isn't already in the game, so instead I'll steal the Generic from an oldies, translate(with the help of google) and change the lyrics so it suite better Pepper and Carrot.

She came from a Magic Kingdom.
A girl with a little bit of charm.
Pepper! Pepper!
With strange power happen in this town,
Dreams and laughter overflow everywhere.
Pepper! Pepper!
Mahou Tsukai Pepper!

She came riding on a broom with her cat.
A princess that is cutely mischievous.
Pepper! Pepper!
When she start incanting her magic spell,
Suddenly Love and hope jump out everywhere !
Pepper! Pepper!
Mahou Tsukai Pepper!
Pepper, Pepper, Pepper Chan !
